tool.name: CreateWeightTableFrom2DLatLonRunoff
tool.displayname: Create Weight Table From 2D Lat Lon LSM Grid Runoff

param.name: in_runoff_file
param.dialogReference: This is the NetCDF file containing the latitude and longitude values (i.e. the grid).

param.name: in_lat_variable
param.dialogReference: This is the latitude variable with 2-dimensional values.

param.name: in_lon_variable
param.dialogReference: This is the longitude variable with 2-dimensional values.

param.name: in_catchment_features
param.dialogReference: These are the catchment features with a field containing the unique IDs of the associated stream segment in the river network .

param.name: stream_ID
param.dialogReference: This is the fields containing the unique IDs of the associated stream segment in the river network (ex. DrainLnID).

param.name: out_weight_table
param.dialogReference: This is the output location of the weight table.

tool.summary: This tool generates the weight table from the latitude and longitude with 2-dimensional values. Example land surface models with such grids include LIS, Joules, or WRF.

idCitation.resTitle: Create Weight Table From 2D Lat Lon LSM Grid Runoff

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool generates the weight table from the latitude and longitude with 2-dimensional values. Example land surface models with such grids include LIS, Joules, or WRF.
